TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed VBMath extends System.Object

summary.span: 模块包含用于执行算术操作的过程。

span.span: The module contains procedures used to perform mathematical operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模块支持的 Visual Basic 语言关键字和运行时库成员用于生成随机数字。This module supports the Visual Basic language keywords and run-time library members for generating random numbers. ## Examples 此示例使用`Rnd`函数以生成从 1 到 6 的范围内的随机整数值。This example uses the `Rnd` function to generate a random integer value in the range from 1 to 6. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#21)]

related.span: Visual Basic 运行时库成员

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void Randomize() cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载`Randomize`方法不接受种子值。This overload of the `Randomize` method does not take a seed value. 相反，返回系统计时器的值用作新的种子值。Instead, the value returned by the system timer is used as the new seed value. 如果`Randomize`未使用，`Rnd`函数 （不带任何参数） 使用的同一个数字作为种子第一次它被调用，并且此后使用上一次生成数量作为种子值。If `Randomize` is not used, the `Rnd` function (with no arguments) uses the same number as a seed the first time it is called, and thereafter uses the last-generated number as a seed value. > [!NOTE] > 若要重复执行一系列随机数字，调用`Rnd`与之前使用参数为负`Randomize`使用数值自变量。To repeat sequences of random numbers, call `Rnd` with a negative argument immediately before using `Randomize` with a numeric argument. > [!IMPORTANT] > 因为`Random`语句和`Rnd`函数起始种子值和生成在有限范围内的数字，结果可能是可预测的人知道用于生成它们的算法。Because the `Random` statement and the `Rnd` function start with a seed value and generate numbers that fall within a finite range, the results may be predictable by someone who knows the algorithm used to generate them. 因此，`Random`语句和`Rnd`函数不应该用于生成加密中使用的随机数字。Consequently, the `Random` statement and the `Rnd` function should not be used to generate random numbers for use in cryptography. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 此示例使用`Randomize`语句初始化随机数生成器。This example uses the `Randomize` statement to initialize the random-number generator. Number 参数已被省略，因为`Randomize`使用的返回值`Timer`函数作为新的种子值。Because the number argument has been omitted, `Randomize` uses the return value from the `Timer` function as the new seed value. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#21)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void Randomize(float64 Number) cil managed

param.name: Number
param.span: 一个 或任何有效的数值表达式。

span.span: An or any valid numeric expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Randomize` 使用`Number`初始化`Rnd`函数的随机数字生成器，向其提供新的种子值。`Randomize` uses `Number` to initialize the `Rnd` function's random-number generator, giving it a new seed value. 如果省略`Number`，返回系统计时器的值用作新的种子值。If you omit `Number`, the value returned by the system timer is used as the new seed value. 如果`Randomize`未使用，`Rnd`函数 （不带任何参数） 使用的同一个数字作为种子第一次它被调用，并且此后使用上一次生成数量作为种子值。If `Randomize` is not used, the `Rnd` function (with no arguments) uses the same number as a seed the first time it is called, and thereafter uses the last-generated number as a seed value. > [!NOTE] > 若要重复执行一系列随机数字，调用`Rnd`与之前使用参数为负`Randomize`使用数值自变量。To repeat sequences of random numbers, call `Rnd` with a negative argument immediately before using `Randomize` with a numeric argument. 使用`Randomize`具有相同值的`Number`不重复前一序列。Using `Randomize` with the same value for `Number` does not repeat the previous sequence. > [!IMPORTANT] > 因为`Random`语句和`Rnd`函数起始种子值和生成在有限范围内的数字，结果可能是可预测的人知道用于生成它们的算法。Because the `Random` statement and the `Rnd` function start with a seed value and generate numbers that fall within a finite range, the results may be predictable by someone who knows the algorithm used to generate them. 因此，`Random`语句和`Rnd`函数不应该用于生成加密中使用的随机数字。Consequently, the `Random` statement and the `Rnd` function should not be used to generate random numbers for use in cryptography. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 此示例使用`Randomize`语句初始化随机数生成器。This example uses the `Randomize` statement to initialize the random-number generator. Number 参数已被省略，因为`Randomize`使用的返回值`Timer`函数作为新的种子值。Because the number argument has been omitted, `Randomize` uses the return value from the `Timer` function as the new seed value. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#21)]

summary.span: 返回一个 类型的随机数。

span.span: Returns a random number of type .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static float32 Rnd() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 返回一个 类型的随机数。

span.span: Returns a random number of type .

returns.span: 序列中的下一个随机数。

span.span: The next random number in the sequence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Rnd`函数返回一个值小于 1，但大于或等于零。The `Rnd` function returns a value less than 1, but greater than or equal to zero. 然后再调用`Rnd`，使用`Randomize`语句，不带参数初始化了种子随机数字生成器根据系统计时器。Before calling `Rnd`, use the `Randomize` statement without an argument to initialize the random-number generator with a seed based on the system timer. 若要生成在给定范围内的随机整数，请使用下面的公式。To produce random integers in a given range, use the following formula. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#30)] 在这里，`upperbound`是在范围内，最大数目和`lowerbound`为范围中最小的数字。Here, `upperbound` is the highest number in the range, and `lowerbound` is the lowest number in the range. > [!NOTE] > 若要重复执行一系列随机数字，调用`Rnd`与之前使用参数为负`Randomize`使用数值自变量。To repeat sequences of random numbers, call `Rnd` with a negative argument immediately before using `Randomize` with a numeric argument. > [!IMPORTANT] > 因为`Random`语句和`Rnd`函数起始种子值和生成在有限范围内的数字，结果可能是可预测的人知道用于生成它们的算法。Because the `Random` statement and the `Rnd` function start with a seed value and generate numbers that fall within a finite range, the results may be predictable by someone who knows the algorithm used to generate them. 因此，`Random`语句和`Rnd`函数不应该用于生成加密中使用的随机数字。Consequently, the `Random` statement and the `Rnd` function should not be used to generate random numbers for use in cryptography. ## Examples 此示例使用`Rnd`函数以生成从 1 到 6 的范围内的随机整数值。This example uses the `Rnd` function to generate a random integer value in the range from 1 to 6. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#21)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static float32 Rnd(float32 Number) cil managed
Public Function Rnd (Number As Single) As Single

param.name: Number
param.span: 一个 值或任何有效的 表达式。

span.span: A value or any valid expression.

summary.span: 返回一个 类型的随机数。

span.span: Returns a random number of type .

returns.span: 如果 Number 小于零，则 Rnd 每次都使用 作为种子生成相同的数字。

span.span: If number is less than zero, Rnd generates the same number every time, using as the seed.

returns.span: 如果 Number 大于零，则 Rnd 生成序列中的下一个随机数。

span.span: If number is greater than zero, Rnd generates the next random number in the sequence.

returns.span: 如果 Number 等于零，则 Rnd 生成最近生成的数字。

span.span: If number is equal to zero, Rnd generates the most recently generated number.

returns.span: 如果未提供 Number，则 Rnd 生成序列中的下一个随机数。

span.span: If number is not supplied, Rnd generates the next random number in the sequence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Rnd`函数返回一个值小于 1，但大于或等于零。The `Rnd` function returns a value less than 1, but greater than or equal to zero. 值`Number`确定如何`Rnd`生成随机数字。The value of `Number` determines how `Rnd` generates a random number. 对于任何给定的初始种子，会生成相同的数字序列，因为每次连续调用`Rnd`函数使用以前生成的数字作为种子序列中的下一个编号。For any given initial seed, the same number sequence is generated because each successive call to the `Rnd` function uses the previously generated number as a seed for the next number in the sequence. 然后再调用`Rnd`，使用`Randomize`语句，不带参数初始化了种子随机数字生成器根据系统计时器。Before calling `Rnd`, use the `Randomize` statement without an argument to initialize the random-number generator with a seed based on the system timer. 若要生成在给定范围内的随机整数，请使用下面的公式。To produce random integers in a given range, use the following formula. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#30)] 在这里，`upperbound`是在范围内，最大数目和`lowerbound`为范围中最小的数字。Here, `upperbound` is the highest number in the range, and `lowerbound` is the lowest number in the range. > [!NOTE] > 若要重复执行一系列随机数字，调用`Rnd`与之前使用参数为负`Randomize`使用数值自变量。To repeat sequences of random numbers, call `Rnd` with a negative argument immediately before using `Randomize` with a numeric argument. 使用`Randomize`具有相同值的`Number`不重复前一序列。Using `Randomize` with the same value for `Number` does not repeat the previous sequence. > [!IMPORTANT] > 因为`Random`语句和`Rnd`函数起始种子值和生成在有限范围内的数字，结果可能是可预测的人知道用于生成它们的算法。Because the `Random` statement and the `Rnd` function start with a seed value and generate numbers that fall within a finite range, the results may be predictable by someone who knows the algorithm used to generate them. 因此，`Random`语句和`Rnd`函数不应该用于生成加密中使用的随机数字。Consequently, the `Random` statement and the `Rnd` function should not be used to generate random numbers for use in cryptography. ## Examples 此示例使用`Rnd`函数以生成从 1 到 6 的范围内的随机整数值。This example uses the `Rnd` function to generate a random integer value in the range from 1 to 6. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#21)]
